title: Early Black Friday iPhone case deals
content:
Macworld

Just about any product you can think of has a Black Friday deal somewhere, and there are plenty if you are thinking of buying a new iPhone case. You can save your phone from drops and scrapes and save yourself a bunch of cash in the process. Black Friday deals on iPhone cases abound.

Black Friday isn’t just the Thanksgiving weekend. Deals are live already and extend through to Cyber Monday on Monday, November 27.

Here are the best prices for iPhone cases we have seen leading up to the big discount shopping extravaganza. Some require codes; others not.

Most case makers offer protection and style for iPhones from version 11 up.

Casely is offering 50% off its huge range of colorful case designs. No code required. The Classic cases are glossy and flexible. The Bold cases are some of our favorite design-led protective cases. The range is well worth a look and you buy now for half-price bargains.

Casetify is another brand that offers an almost ridiculously large range of iPhone case designs, ranging from the thin to the super-protective. It is offering up to 30% off using the code BF2023 this Black Friday.

ESR is also halving prices on some of its iPhone accessories, including its flexible clear cases with built-in stands and other features. Code: BLACK20. Its offers cases for the iPhone 7 and later. You’ve still got an iPhone 7?

There is a range of Black Friday discounts at the QDOS iPhone case store. No code required. It specializes in clear and tinted iPhone cases, with varying levels of protection.

Another clear-case maker is Totallee, which is offering 50% of its cases until November 30 either direct or via Amazon.

Mous makes some quirky iPhone cases with wood, iridescent and pearl-effect designs, and is offering up to 30% off a portion of its range. No code required.

If you want a slim but protective iPhone case, check out the options at Benks, which is offering 15% off everything using code BF15, and 20% off orders over $100 (BF20).

This Black Friday you can get up to a massive 60% off Pitaka pixelated iPhone cases, as well as deals on its Apple Watch bands and iPad cases. No code required.

Eco case maker Wave has redubbed Black Friday as Green Friday and is offering 20% off with the code GREENISTHENEWBLACK.

A similar (up to) 60% off is being offered by leather iPhone case maker Decoded. No code required.

Not messing around with percentages, the MOFT Black Friday sale delivers up to $60 off, using various codes. BF60 saves you $60 on orders over $200, BF37 over $150, BF20 over $100 and BF10 over $50. There are also tempting deals on its range of MagSafe accessories.

We’ve tested the best iPhone 15 cases and many of those cases are also available for earlier iPhone versions. Remember to look out for MagSafe compatibility in cases for iPhone 12 and later as that means you can magnetically and wirelessly charge your iPhone without having to remove the case.
